text:
Splunk | Frontend Engineer / Machine Learning Engineer | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE | Full-time | Benefits + Equity [0]

My team at Splunk is currently looking for frontend engineers to help build tools & visualizations to analyze and extract insights from big data utilizing state of the art technologies.

Sounds interesting? Read more: http://bit.ly/frontend-eng-splunk

-

More interested in how to make products intelligent with machine learning?

We're also looking for software engineers who are curious about ML! http://bit.ly/ml-engineer-splunk

-

Feel free to ping me at pwied at company name .com (add HN to the subject) if you have any questions
